items.name: Potion
items.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

items.name: Great Ball
items.description: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

items.name: Max Revive
items.description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a Pokémon's HP.

items.name: Escape Rope
items.description: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a dangerous cave or dungeon.

items.name: Lucky Egg
items.description: A consumable item that increases the amount of experience points earned in battle by the holder.

items.name: TM23
items.description: A special item that teaches the move Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.

items.name: Max Potion
items.description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore all of a Pokémon's HP.

items.name: Big Mushroom
items.description: A valuable mushroom that can be sold for a high price. It can be found in dark, damp areas.

items.name: Super Repel
items.description: A spray-type repellent that keeps wild Pokémon at bay. It lasts longer than the standard Repel.

items.name: Elixir
items.description: A medicine that fully restores the PP of all the moves of a single Pokémon.

items.name: Sharp Beak
items.description: A beak that is as hard as diamond. It is said that it can slice through anything with ease.

items.name: Leftovers
items.description: A hold item that gradually restores the HP of the holder each turn during battle.

items.name: Revive
items.description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It restores half of a Pokémon's maximum HP.

items.name: Big Pearl
items.description: A valuable pearl that can be sold for a high price. It can be found in the ocean.
